personal.name: Abdullah Basharat
personal.title: AI/ML Engineer
personal.tagline: Transforming ideas into intelligent solutions through cutting-edge AI/ML technologies

about.introduction: Passionate AI/ML Engineer with expertise in Large Language Models, RAG systems, and deep learning. Currently pursuing Data Science at PUCIT with a strong academic record and hands-on experience in developing intelligent solutions.

education.institution: Punjab University College of Information Technology (PUCIT)

experience.title: AI/ML Engineer
experience.description: Developing and deploying advanced AI/ML solutions with focus on LLMs and RAG systems.
achievements: Built production-ready RAG systems using LangChain and ChromaDB
Implemented agentic chunking for improved context retrieval
Developed real-time AI-powered chatbots with 95% accuracy

experience.title: AI/ML Intern
experience.description: Gained hands-on experience in machine learning model development and deployment.
achievements: Developed computer vision models for object detection
Worked on natural language processing projects
Collaborated with senior engineers on ML pipeline optimization

projects.title: Pakistan Sign Language Recognition
projects.description: Advanced computer vision system for recognizing Pakistan Sign Language gestures using I3D ConvNet architecture.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive sign language recognition system achieving 88% accuracy on 30 gesture classes. The system uses advanced deep learning techniques including I3D ConvNet for temporal feature extraction and real-time gesture recognition.

projects.title: RAG-Powered Chatbot
projects.description: Intelligent chatbot leveraging Retrieval-Augmented Generation with LangChain and ChromaDB for context-aware responses.
projects.longDescription: Built a sophisticated chatbot system using RAG architecture with LangChain, LangGraph, and ChromaDB. Features include agentic chunking, real-time context retrieval, and multi-turn conversation handling with high accuracy.

projects.title: Speech-to-Text & OCR Pipeline
projects.description: Bilingual text processing system supporting English and Urdu with advanced OCR capabilities.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive text processing pipeline supporting both speech-to-text conversion and optical character recognition for English and Urdu languages. Integrates OpenCV for image preprocessing and Tesseract for accurate text extraction.

achievements: Dean's List recognition for academic excellence (GPA: 3.86/4.00)
Successfully deployed multiple AI/ML models in production
Published research on computer vision applications
